basic.Source: Synthetic construct(derived from HSV-1 B glycoprotein (gB))
basic.Target Organism: [Ref.19104014]Herpes simplex virus type 1(HSV-1):comprehensive antiviral activity(EC50=6.5±1.3 µM);inhibition of virus entry in Vero cells(EC50>200 µM);inhibition of virus infection in Vero cells(EC50=165.0±71.9 µM);ability of inactive virus(EC50=125±11.4 µM);inhibition of virus attachment on Vero cells(EC50>200 µM).
